short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays information on a Roblox horror game based on data from robloxhorrorlist.com!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When a user clicks on a game on roblox.com, if that game is listed on the robloxhorrorlist.com database, it will display the rating from that database next to the game's name.
